langs.about_text:
Welcome to Royal Gardens, a family resort located in the picturesque Bostanlyk district, just 65 km from the city. Our hotel offers comfortable accommodation in 18 rooms and 8 cottages, with the capacity to host up to 90 guests.


We pride ourselves on the diversity of our services and leisure opportunities: five categories of modern rooms, indoor and outdoor pools with jacuzzis and breathtaking panoramic mountain views, two restaurants, an eco-farm with horse and camel rides.


For guest relaxation, we offer a Turkish hammam, Japanese sauna, salt cave, and Finnish sauna. For active recreation, we provide a football field, gym, and both indoor and outdoor playgrounds for children. Adventure lovers can enjoy zip line rides and roller coasters.


We also have a massage room, conference hall, and spacious parking for your convenience.
